'''LinuxSysInfo''' is a [[freeware]] [[Microsoft Windows|Windows]] based Application which can be used to retrieve and examine the information from remote [[linux]] servers (i.e. load/uptime/kernel/hardware/processes/top/logedin users/login logs/firewall/disks/system/network/connections). It also include a simple SSH2 command line console. It use [[SSH2]] protocol to do the secure communication with remote [[Linux]] server. It is tested with [[Fedora (operating system)|Fedora Core]], [[Gentoo Linux|Gentoo]], [[Debian]], [[Centos]]. It is recommended but not necessary to use root level login with this application.
The latest version of LinuxSysInfo is 1.0 (Beta).
Support for LinuxSysInfo is provided by the author, support forums on the website.
